Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Yoodhaavinudaiya Raajaakkalin Elumbugalaiyum, Avargaludaiya Prabukkalin Elumbugalaiyum, Aasaariyargalin Elumbugalaiyum, Theerkkadharisigalin Elumbugalaiyum, Erusalemudaiya Kudigalin Elumbugalaiyum, Avargaludaiya Predhakkuzhigalilirundhu Eduththu,

2 avargal Nesiththadhum, Seviththadhum, Pinpatrinadhum, Naadinadhum, Panindhukondadhumaayirundha Sooriyanukkum, Sandhiranukkum, Vaanaththin Sarvasenaikkum Munbaaga Avaigalaip Parappivaippaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Avaigal Vaari Adakkampannappadaamal Boomiyinmel Eruvaagum.

3 indhath Thushta Vamsaththil Meedhiyaayirundhu, Ennaal Ellaa Idangalilum Thuraththividappattu Meendhirukkira Yaavarukkum, Jeevanaippaarkkilum Maraname Viruppamaayirukkumendru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
4 nee Avargalai Nokki: Vizhundhavargal Ezhundhirukkiradhillaiyo? Vazhithappipponavargal Thirumbugiradhillaiyo?
5 aanaalum Erusalemiyaraagiya Indha Janam Endraikkum Vazhithappippogiradhenna? Kabadaththai Urudhiyaaip Pidiththirukkiraargal; Thirumbamaattom Engiraargal.

6 naan Gavaniththuk Ketten, Avargal Yadhaarththam Pesavillai; Enna Seydhenendru Solli, Than Pollaappinimiththam Manasthaabappadugiravan Oruvanumillai; Yuththaththukkul Paaigira Kudhiraiyaippola Avaravar Vegamaai Odipponaargal.

7 aagaayaththilulla Naarai Mudhalaaith Than Velaiyai Ariyum; Kaattuppuraavum, Kokkum, Thagaivilaan Kuruviyum Thaangal Varaththakka Kaalaththai Ariyum; En Janangalo Karththarin Nyaayaththai Ariyaargal Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol.
8 naangal Gnaanigalendrum, Karththarudaiya Vedham Engalidaththilirukkiradhendrum Neengal Sollugiradheppadi? Meyyaagave, Idho, Vedhapaaragarin Kalla Ezhuththaani Adhai Abaththamaakkugiradhu.
9 gnaanigal Vetki, Kalangip Pidipaduvaargal; Idho, Karththarudaiya Sollai Veruththuppottaargal; Avargalukku Gnaanamedhu?

10 aagaiyaal Avargaludaiya Sthreegalai Anniyarukkum, Avargaludaiya Vayalgalai Avaigalaik Kattikkolbavargalukkum Koduppen; Avargalile Siriyor Thodangip Periyormattum Ovvoruvarum Porulaasaikkaararaayirukkiraargal; Theerkkadharisigal Thodangi Aasaariyargal Mattum Ovvoruvarum Poiyaraayirundhu,
11 samaadhaanamillaadhirundhum, Samaadhaanam Samaadhaanam Endru Solli, En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththiyin Kaayangalai Merpoochchaaik Gunamaakkugiraargal.

12 thaangal Aruvaruppaanadhai Seydhadhinimiththam Vetkappadugiraargalaa? Parichchedham Vetkappadaargal, Naanavum Ariyaargal; Aagaiyaal Vizhugiravargalukkulle Vizhuvaargal; Naan Avargalai Visaarikkunkaalaththile Idarundupovaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

13 avargalai Mutrilum Azhiththuppoduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Dhraatchachchediyile Kulaigaliraadhu, Aththimaraththile Pazhangaliraadhu, Ilaiyum Udhirum, Naan Avargalukkuk Koduththadhu Avargalaivittuth Thaandippogum Endru Sol.

14 naam Summaayiruppaanen? Koodivaarungal; Naam Aranaana Pattanangalukkul Pravesiththu, Ange Sangaaramaavom; Naam Karththarukku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhapadiyaal, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Nammai Sangaarampanni, Namakkup Pichchukkalandha Thanneeraik Kudikkakkodukkiraar.
15 samaadhaanaththukkuk Kaaththirundhom, Prayojanamillai; Aarokkiyakaalaththukkuk Kaaththirundhom, Idho, Aabaththu.

16 thaanilirundhu Avargaludaiya Kudhiraigalin Moochcheridhal Ketkappadugiradhu; Avargaludaiya Balaththa Asvangal Kanaikkira Saththaththinaal Dhesamellaam Adhirugiradhu; Avargal Vandhu Dhesaththaiyum Adhil Ullavaigalaiyum, Pattanaththaiyum Adhin Kudigalaiyum Patchippaargal.
17 meyyaai, Idho, Thadaikattappadaadha Sarppangalaiyum, Kattuviriyangalaiyum Ungalukkul Anuppugiren, Avaigal Ungalaik Kadikkum Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
18 naan Sanjalaththil Aarudhaladaiyappaarththum, En Irudhayam Balatchayamaayirukkiradhu.

19 idho, Seeyonil Karththar Illaiyo? Adhil Raajaa Illaiyo? Endru, En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththi Dhooradhesaththilirundhu Kooppidum Saththam Ketkappadugiradhu; Aanaal, Avargal Thangal Suroobangalinaalum Anniyarin Maayaigalinaalum Enakkuk Kobamundaakkinadhu Enna Engiraar.
20 aruppukkaalam Sendradhu, Kodaikkaalamum Mudindhadhu, Naamo Ratchikkappadavillai.
21 en Janamaagiya Kumaaraththiyin Kaayangalinaal Naanum Kaayappatten; Karigaruththirukkiren; Thigaippu Ennaip Pidiththadhu.
22 keeleyaaththile Pisin Thailam Illaiyo? Iranavaiththiyanum Ange Illaiyo? Pinnai En En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththi Sosthamadaiyaamarponaal?
